title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Mix eggs, cheese, and pepper in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta.
Stir in the egg mixture off the heat.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.
